name: Space Leaper
description:
Wonder what a rabbit is doing in space? How is it going to eat? What will it do there?
Find answers to these questions as you play this adventurous game based on simple physics.
Game play:
You will never get bored with this game as it challenges you to make the rabbit jump from one planet to the other by selecting an appropriate angle to land the rabbit. The rabbit gets to collects its food & other collectibles on the way.
Features like a gun that collects the rabbit & automatically shooting it to another planet make the app interesting. You can even tap twice to make the rabbit double jump to cover long distances between the planets. Remember to save the rabbit’s three lives by preventing it from falling in space.
Features:
•Cute rabbit hopping on planets
•Get practice with your physics
•Increasing speed with each level
•Special features like gun & multiple lives
•Continuous game play

Note: As this app is free, it may contain third party advertisements.
